Boss, if the money I previously topped up into my wallet hasnâ€™t been used for betting, can I withdraw it?

languages.en: Can I withdraw deposited funds if I havenâ€™t placed any bets?
languages.ms: Bolehkah saya mengeluarkan dana deposit jika saya belum membuat pertaruhan?

detailed.en: "Sorry, boss, the top-up amount cannot be withdrawn. You need to place bets and win 30% before you can make a withdrawal! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: How long does it take for a withdrawal to be processed?

languages.en: How long does it take for a withdrawal to be processed?
languages.ms: Berapa lamakah masa yang diperlukan untuk memproses pengeluaran?

detailed.en: "Boss, withdrawal processing normally takes 5-30 minutes to complete. If itâ€™s not credited after 30 minutes, please inform us immediately! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, pemprosesan pengeluaran biasanya mengambil masa 5-30 minit untuk selesai. Jika belum masuk selepas 30 minit, sila maklumkan kepada kami segera! ğŸ˜Š"

detailed.en:
"Hi boss, the minimum withdrawal is RM10 ya. ğŸ˜ŠğŸ’°

ğŸ“Œ Withdrawal Conditions:

If you have other questions, reply to us in live chat ya boss! ğŸ™ğŸ”¥"

question.text: Berapa jumlah minimum untuk withdrawal dan apakah panduan kategori pertaruhan 4D, 3D, dan 2D?
variations: Berapa minimum jumlah yang diperlukan untuk withdraw dan bagaimana kategori 4D, 3D, 2D ditentukan?
Apa syarat minimum untuk withdrawal dan panduan untuk pertaruhan 4D, 3D, 2D?
Berapakah jumlah minimum withdraw dan bagaimana cara menentukan 3D dan 2D daripada 4D?

languages.en: "What is the minimum amount required for withdrawal and what are the betting guidelines for 4D, 3D, and 2D?"
languages.ms: "Berapa jumlah minimum untuk withdrawal dan apakah panduan kategori pertaruhan 4D, 3D, dan 2D?"

detailed.en:
"Hi boss, the current minimum withdrawal amount is RM30. Additionally, here are the guidelines for the betting categories:

â€¢ 4D (Tegak Sahaja): Includes prizes 4A (1st), 4B (2nd), 4C (3rd), 4D (Special), and 4E (Consolation).

â€¢ 3D: Based on the last three digits of the 4D number, with categories such as 3A (1st), 3B (2nd), 3C (3rd), 3D (Special, multiplied by 10), 3E (Consolation, multiplied by 10), and 3N covering all prizes.

â€¢ 2D: Based on the last two digits of the 4D number, with categories 2A (1st), 2B (2nd), 2C (3rd), 2D (Special, multiplied by 10), 2E (Consolation, multiplied by 10), and 2N covering all prizes.

For 3D and 2D, only the ending digits of the 4D number are used (e.g., if 4D = 1234, then 3D = 234 and 2D = 34)."
detailed.ms:
"Hi boss, jumlah minimum untuk withdrawal adalah RM30. Berikut juga panduan untuk kategori pertaruhan:

â€¢ 4D (Tegak Sahaja): Termasuk hadiah 4A (1st), 4B (2nd), 4C (3rd), 4D (Special) dan 4E (Consolation).

â€¢ 3D: Berdasarkan tiga digit terakhir nombor 4D, dengan kategori seperti 3A (1st), 3B (2nd), 3C (3rd), 3D (Special, X10), 3E (Consolation, X10) dan 3N merangkumi semua hadiah.

â€¢ 2D: Berdasarkan dua digit terakhir nombor 4D, dengan kategori 2A (1st), 2B (2nd), 2C (3rd), 2D (Special, X10), 2E (Consolation, X10) dan 2N merangkumi semua hadiah.

Untuk 3D dan 2D, hanya digit terakhir nombor 4D yang digunakan (contoh: jika 4D = 1234, maka 3D = 234 dan 2D = 34)."

question.text: Boss, my withdrawal just now was rejected
variations: Boss, my withdrawal just now was rejected

languages.en: Why was my withdrawal just now rejected?

detailed.en:
"Hi boss, if the withdrawal was rejected, the credit should automatically return to your wallet.

ğŸ“Œ Check your wallet first, if itâ€™s not there:
ğŸ”¹ Log out & log back into the app.
ğŸ”¹ If itâ€™s still not visible, try restarting your phone or switching networks (WiFi/Data).

ğŸ“Œ If it still hasnâ€™t returned after checking, reply to us in live chat for further help! ğŸ˜ŠğŸ™"
detailed.ms:
"Hi boss, kalau withdraw ditolak (rejected), kredit pasti akan dikembalikan ke wallet secara automatik.

ğŸ“Œ Boss boleh semak wallet dulu, jika belum masuk:
ğŸ”¹ Logout & login semula ke dalam app.
ğŸ”¹ Jika masih tak nampak, cuba restart phone atau tukar rangkaian internet (WiFi/Data).

ğŸ“Œ Jika masih belum masuk selepas semakan, boleh roger kami di live chat untuk bantuan lanjut! ğŸ˜ŠğŸ™"

question.text: Why do I need to meet turnover requirements before withdrawing?
variations: Why must I reach turnover to withdraw?
What's the purpose of turnover requirements?

languages.en: Why do I need to meet turnover requirements before withdrawing?
languages.ms: Kenapa saya perlu capai turnover sebelum withdraw?

detailed.en: Turnover requirements are standard conditions, boss! You need to achieve a minimum betting amount (usually 30% of your deposit) before you can withdraw your money. This helps prevent misuse and maintains fair play for everyone.
detailed.ms: Syarat turnover tu standard je, boss! Anda perlu capai jumlah pertaruhan minimum (biasanya 30% daripada deposit anda) sebelum boleh withdraw duit. Ini untuk elakkan salah guna dan pastikan permainan adil untuk semua.
